answers.answer: Just fast the night before up until the test. I failed both test 150 but I had been eating horrible the last two months. If you change your eating habits now to when you give birth you should be fine.

I failed the one hour one with a 142, but I passed the 3 hour one. Make sure you don't drink or eat anything at least 12 hours for your appointment. It's very similar to the one hour one, they just take your blood 4 times instead of once. They do it once when you get there and then once every hour for 3 hours. Don't stress about it until you get the results from the 3 hour test :)
And even if you fail the 3 hour test you just have to see a special doctor to watch your diet so you eat better. Your baby is not in danger don't worry.

question: So yesterday i did my diabetes screening and was called in today by doctors for results. Doctor said i have to take a 3 hour test. What should i expect from this test? Doctor said results should be below 129, and mine was 156. Should i worry? Is my baby at risk? I'm so confused...
title: gestational diabetes?
